resources.string: There\'s nothing here... \nWhen Humlab assigns you a survey, you will see it here.
-Here you can write to the researchers for Lang-Track-App-
-Here you can write to the developers for Lang-Track-App-

If you are experiencing any technical issues, please contact Stephan Björck.
stephan.bjorck@humlab.lu.se

If you have questions or comments about the content of the survey, please email Henriette Arndt.
henriette.arndt@humlab.lu.se
Do you want to log out \n%1$s?
" Select a word from the list"
Click outside the text box to close the keyboard
Do you want to close the survey and return to the start page?\nThe answers will not be saved.
The Lang Track App is an app developed by Lund University Humanities Lab for research purposes.\n\nLog in with the username and password assigned to you by Lund University Humanities Lab
Please enter your username and password

We developed the Lang-Track-App to study when, where, and how often language learners are in contact with different foreign languages in everyday life. This crucial to improving our understanding of the challenges of language learning outside of classrooms.\n\nThe project is a collaboration between the Lund University Centre for Languages and Literature and Lund University Humanities Lab.
Marianne Gullberg, Professor of Psycholinguistics, Centre for Languages and Literature
Jonas Granfeldt, Professor of French Linguistics, Centre for Languages and Literature
Henriette Arndt, Postdoctoral Research Fellow, LU Humanities Lab
Josef Granqvist, Systems Developer, LU Humanities Lab
Stephan Björck, Systems Developer, LU Humanities Lab

We will ask you to complete brief surveys in this app a few times per day. You will receive a push notification whenever there is a new survey. Make sure you keep your phone nearby and the notification sounds turned on! \n\nIt’s important that you answer each survey as soon as possible. If you don’t answer a survey, it will automatically expire after 60 minutes.

In addition to your survey responses, the app will automatically record the date and time when you opened each survey and when you submitted your answers. The app will not record any other data, e.g. about your location. \n\nYour data will be compiled and analyzed by the project team. No one else will have access to your answers. When we report the results of the project, all information will be anonymized.
